q: , who has always denied any knowledge of wrongdoing at the newspaper, said he could not focus on his role at Downing Street given the renewed speculation about what went on when he ran the newspaper. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in a statement. Desmond Bishop stepped into the picture and with a mighty one-handed swipe took DeSean Jackson down with a shoestring tackle at the Packers' 38-yard line. ''That was big,'' Packers defensive end Ryan Pickett said. Actually it saved the game. That's a touchdown-saving tackle. Thanks to Desmond Bishop , DeSean Jackson was stopped in his tracks after a 28-yard reception. Four plays later Eagles quarterback Michael Vick threw his fateful interception to Tramon Williams in the end zone to seal the Packers' 21-16 victory

Player for nearly 20 minutes, using his quickness to prevent Allen Iverson from even getting the ball, let alone shoot it. He had spent the last two practices impersonating Allen Iverson and apparently got pretty good at it. I just try to deny him the ball as much as possible, because when he does get the ball, the best penetrator in the game is going to be hard to stop, Tyronn Lue said.
